title: Subchapter A - Medical Facilities-minimum Standards
content:
Subchapter A - Medical Facilities-minimum Standards

State Regulations

Article 1 - General (Part 400 to 404)

Article 2 - Hospitals (Part 405 to 408)

Article 3 - Residential Care Facilities (Part 410 to 416)

Article 5 - HIV/AIDS Health Services (Part 420 to 422)

Article 6 - Adult Day Health Care in Residential Health Care Facilities (Part 425 to 427)

Article 7 - Home Health Agencies; Treatment Centers and Diagnostic Centers (Part 430 to 432)

Article 8 - New York State Annual Hospital Report (Part 440 to 448)

Article 9 - Residential Health Care Facility Uniform Reporting (Part 450 to 590)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Article 1 - General (Part 400 to 404)

Article 2 - Hospitals (Part 405 to 408)

Article 3 - Residential Care Facilities (Part 410 to 416)

Article 5 - HIV/AIDS Health Services (Part 420 to 422)

Article 6 - Adult Day Health Care in Residential Health Care Facilities (Part 425 to 427)

Article 7 - Home Health Agencies; Treatment Centers and Diagnostic Centers (Part 430 to 432)

Article 8 - New York State Annual Hospital Report (Part 440 to 448)

Article 9 - Residential Health Care Facility Uniform Reporting (Part 450 to 590)
